alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 12:30PM PST until December 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...South End San Joaquin Valley, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. The strongest gusts will likely occur through the Grapevine, including along Interstate 5 from Lebec to the Highway 99 split, and over exposed ridges. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi
